main_definition: To become visible or to be seen in a particular place, situation, or condition.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To come into sight; to seem or appear (in a certain way)
meanings_and_examples.example: When she entered the room, he seemed upset.
He appeared at the party just when we were about to leave.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To come into existence or be brought forth; emerge
meanings_and_examples.example: The sun will appear in the eastern sky soon.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To give the impression of being (something) when, in fact, it is not so
meanings_and_examples.example: His calm demeanor did not seem like that of a person who was nervous.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To become visible or known; to come into notice
meanings_and_examples.example: The new artist appeared on the local music scene with her debut album.
